puzzles.name: Discover the Hub
puzzles.description: Find the first community hub and solve the puzzle.
puzzles.location: Located in the downtown district near the main conference center.
puzzles.puzzle: Find the QR code at the community hub and solve the riddle to get the codeword.

puzzles.name: The Hidden Message
puzzles.description: Decode the message at the second community hub.
puzzles.location: Look for the building with the distinctive architecture in the tech quarter.
puzzles.puzzle: Use the cipher wheel at the hub to decode the hidden message.

puzzles.name: Journey's End
puzzles.description: Complete the final puzzle and claim your treasure.
puzzles.location: Return to where your journey began, but look closer this time.
puzzles.puzzle: Combine all the clues from previous puzzles to solve the final riddle.
